biotools.summary: JASPAR is a widely used open-access database containing curated, non-redundant transcription factor binding profiles. The JASPAR RESTful API enhances accessibility by enabling users to programmatically access the database by most programming languages.The API uses the Representational State Transfer (REST) architecture to provide data in multiple formats (JSON, JSONP, JASPAR, MEME, PFM, TRANSFAC, BED, and YAML). The JASPAR API is user-friendly, offering a browsable interface designed for bioinformatics tool developers.
